casebody.data:
Steven F. HOTZE, et al., petitioners,
v.
Sylvia BURWELL, Secretary of Health and Human Services, et al. No. 15-622. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 29, 2016.

Motion of Foundation for Moral Law for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
